description: Designed from the inside out to withstand the harshest conditions on unpredictable terrain, the Ultra Raptor II Mid GTX is the perfect option for hikers who need a shoe that can handle the daily grind. Stable, all-terrain cushioning with a waterproof and breathable lining provides reliable protection on rough, wet trails.
name: La Sportiva Ultra Raptor II Mid GTX - Mens

specs.value: Ortholite Hybrid with 5% recycled rubber + 15% production waste foam
